metadata.name: PUA - 3Proxy Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of 3proxy, a tiny free proxy server

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\3proxy.exe')) OR lower(device.desc) = lower('3proxy - tiny proxy server') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe -i127.0.0.1 -p'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of 3proxy, a tiny free proxy server

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrative activity References: https://github.com/3proxy/3proxy, https://blog.talosintelligence.com/2022/09/lazarus-three-rats.html
